metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20805 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of serviceby issuing specially crafted queries, which perform an $elemMatch Thisissue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.5;v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.10. This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDBServer 3.6 versions prior to 3.6.10; 4.0 versions prior to 4.0.5.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
